skill.name: executing-marketing-campaigns
skill.description: Plans, creates, and optimizes marketing campaigns including content strategy, social media, email, and analytics. Helps develop go-to-market strategies, campaign messaging, and performance measurement.
skill.summary: Plans, creates, and optimizes marketing campaigns including content strategy, social media, email, a...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: This skill consists primarily of documentation and templates for marketing campaign planning. The included Python utility script (marketing_utils.py) only generates UTM parameters and validates URLs - standard marketing operations. No network calls, no credential access, no external command execution. Legitimate marketing resource.

content.value_statement: Marketing teams struggle to create coordinated campaigns across multiple channels. This skill provides proven frameworks, templates, and best practices for campaign planning, content creation, social media, email marketing, and performance measurement.
actual_capabilities: Create structured marketing campaign plans using proven frameworks
Write effective marketing copy for email, landing pages, blog, and social media
Generate UTM tracking parameters for campaign attribution
Build email sequences and templates for welcome, nurture, and promotional campaigns
Define marketing KPIs and set up campaign performance measurement
Ensure brand consistency across all marketing channels
limitations: Does not execute campaigns on external platforms (social media, email tools, ads)
Does not access or analyze your existing marketing data
Does not create graphics or visual assets
Requires you to customize templates with your brand voice and audience details

use_cases.title: Plan campaign strategy
use_cases.description: Develop comprehensive campaign plans with objectives, audience targeting, channel strategy, and success metrics.

use_cases.title: Write marketing copy
use_cases.description: Create compelling email copy, landing page content, blog posts, and social media content using proven formulas.

use_cases.title: Set up campaign tracking
use_cases.description: Generate UTM parameters, define KPIs, and build attribution frameworks for measuring campaign performance.

prompt_templates.title: Create campaign plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me create a marketing campaign plan for [product/service]. Target audience is [description]. Campaign goal is [specific objective]. Use the campaign development template from this skill.

prompt_templates.title: Write email copy
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a product launch announcement email using the email template. Product: [name]. Key benefit: [outcome]. Include subject line options and main copy sections.

prompt_templates.title: Generate tracking URLs
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate UTM parameters for a campaign called [name] running on [channel]. Source: [source], Medium: [medium], Campaign: [campaign]. Show the complete tracking URL.

prompt_templates.title: Analyze performance
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me define KPIs for a [type] marketing campaign. Include metrics for awareness, consideration, and conversion stages. Show how to calculate ROI.

output_examples.input: Help me create a lead generation campaign plan for a B2B SaaS product
output: **Campaign Name**: Q1 Lead Gen - B2B SaaS
**Target Audience**: IT Directors at mid-market companies (100-1000 employees)
**Key Messages**: (1) Cut reporting time by 50%, (2) Enterprise security compliance, (3) Free pilot program
**Channels**: LinkedIn sponsored content, email nurture sequence, Google search ads
**Success Metrics**: MQLs generated, CPL under $50, SQL conversion rate 25%

best_practices: Start every campaign with clear objectives and defined target audience personas
Use UTM parameters consistently on all campaign links to enable accurate attribution
Test one variable at a time in emails and ads to identify what drives results
Align messaging across channels while adapting format to each platform
anti_patterns: Launching campaigns without defined success metrics or tracking setup
Using generic messaging instead of audience-specific value propositions
Cross-posting identical content across all social platforms without adaptation
Focusing on features instead of customer outcomes and benefits

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Claude Code, and Codex. It is optimized for Claude models and provides best results with Opus or Sonnet.

faq.question: What marketing channels does this skill cover?
faq.answer: The skill covers email, social media (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube), content marketing, paid advertising, and landing pages.

faq.question: Can this skill create graphics or images?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides copy templates and content guidelines. For visual assets, you will need to use design tools or work with a designer.

faq.question: Is my marketing data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill is entirely prompt-based. It does not access your systems, store data, or make external network requests. All processing happens within your AI conversation.

faq.question: How do I set up campaign tracking?
faq.answer: Use the marketing_utils.py script to generate UTM parameters. The skill includes detailed guidance on UTM format, attribution models, and which metrics to track at each funnel stage.

faq.question: How is this different from hiring a marketing consultant?
faq.answer: This skill provides frameworks and templates instantly. It is not a replacement for strategic consultants but accelerates campaign planning and ensures best practices. You still need to customize templates with your specific audience and brand voice.
